Welcome to the winter datathon!

We are looking looking at two sources of data:

- Water availability by household
- Area Deprivation Index

Both of these measures are measured at the County level.

We will do some simple spatial data exploration and explore these datasets.

## Area Deprivation Index

The Area Deprivation Index is a measure of Social Determinants of Health (SDoH) that determine a region's access. In short, it summarizes three key factors in their calculation:

- Financial Strength
- Economic Hardship and Inequality
- Educational Attainment
